page.title: 13CHILDREN AT WORK_PATRICK
page.content: It's my job at home to do the gardening. Every second weekend I cut the grass. Through the week I dig the garden. I am trying to grow tomatoes, onions, lettuces, spinach and marrows. I have five rows of potatoes planted. I also help with odd jobs around the house by washing the dishes and keeping my room tidy. Sometimes I help my dad on the farm. Through harvest I help. I sit on the combine and sometimes I have to sit on the barley bin because it sometimes overflows. Then I help stack the bales in the sheds. During silage I help with the choppers, switching their engines on and off. Usually I just sit in the tractors.
